description:
Dirt provides the basis for much of the overworld biomes.  When placed next to either [[Grass]] or [[Mycelium]], the neighboring plant life will slowly convert the dirt.

When right-clicked with a hoe, the dirt will be transformed into tilled dirt, capable of growing plants.  However, such tilled dirt will revert to being plain dirt before long if not within 4 blocks of a water block on the same level as itself.
